Creates service remoting client factory.

protected virtual Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Remoting.Client.IServiceRemotingClientFactory CreateServiceRemotingClientFactory (Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Remoting.IServiceRemotingCallbackClient callbackClient);

IServiceRemotingCallbackClient

Returns

Created service remoting client factory as IServiceRemotingClientFactory
